prj:TemporalParameters.prj:note:
We want to observe both variability and spectra shape. We request multi band(band 3,6,7) observation within ~1hour, and the last band (band 7 ; LO 356GHz) continue observing 5.0 hour.
So this observation performed like band 3(estimated time) --> band 6 (estimated time) --> band 7 (~ 5.0 hour)

prj:TechnicalJustification.prj:justificationText:
Frequency : We need broad band photometry data Sensitivity : We need accuracy of spectral index RMS < 0.1 Angular resolution : Any configuration is acceptable (point source)
We want to observe both variability in band 7 and spectra shape. We request multi band(band 3,6,7) observation within ~1hour, and the last band (band 7 ; LO 356GHz) continous observation with exposure time of 5.0 hours.

prp:ObsProposal.prp:abstract: We perform simultaneous observation of radio-loud narrow-line Seyfert 1 galaxy PMN J0948+0022 in millimeter-to-sub-millimeter, optical, X-ray and gamma-ray band with ALMA, Kanata, Swift and Fermi in order to obtain the complete broad band spectra of the inner jet. This study will be denitely allow us to understand the difference and similarity of jet structure of NLSy1, compared with well-known classes of blazars.
